job_description: data science internship covering data engineering, SQL, python
questions: Tell me about a time you had to work with a large dataset and faced challenges in processing or analyzing it. How did you overcome these challenges?
Can you describe a situation where you had to collaborate with others on a data science project? What was your role, and what challenges did you encounter in working with a team?
Describe a project where you had to apply your SQL skills to extract and analyze data. What was the context of the project, and what were the key findings?
Give me an example of a time you had to learn a new technology or programming language quickly for a project. How did you approach learning it, and what was the outcome?
Tell me about a time you identified an error in your code or analysis. How did you identify the mistake and what steps did you take to fix it?
